title: LinguaSync: Breaking Language Barriers in Video
bullets: The Global Content Dilemma: Billions of viewers, thousands of languages.
Traditional Dubbing: Expensive, time-consuming, often lacks authenticity.
Lost Audiences: Creators miss out on massive international markets.
